author: The Vegetarian Society
method: Preheat the oven to 200C/400F/Gas 6. Place the vegetables and fresh herbs into a roasting tray and cover with olive oil. Bake for 10-15 minutes. Combine the roast vegetables with the cheese, free-range eggs, salt and herbs. Pack the mixture into a 25cm/10in flan dish and bake for 30 minutes.
ingredients: 1 yellow, 1 red and 1 green pepper, seeded and cubed,  2 medium-sized courgettes, cubed,  1 medium-sized aubergine, cubed,  1 tin artichoke hearts, drained and halved ,  1 large onion, peeled and sliced ,  4 bay leaves,  2 sprigs of rosemary,  2 sprigs of oregano ,  1 tsp salt,  3 tsp mixed Italian herbs,  225g/8oz ricotta cheese,  4 free-range eggs, beaten,  5 tbsp olive oil
